attributes.action: supply wheelie bins, so cats stop ripping open rubbish bags
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im feed up clearing up my rubbish after cats have ripped my bags open, the goverment want us to recycle so why not give us a black wheelie bin for general waste and a green wheelie bin for rycycling. this will prevent cats ripping open bags and stop bags being blown around the streets. will also incourage recycling as people will have somewhere to throw any bulky items like drink bottles and cardboard boxes
